local_intent: Ensure the lid is perceived, move to a pose 0.05 m above the pot lid, and verify arrival.
assumptions: If the lid is not visible, retry detection up to 3 times before approaching.
IsAt(target=pot_lid) is used as a proxy to confirm the above-target approach pose.
coherence_with_global: Implements the approach step before alignment: re-confirms perception, executes MoveAbove(pot_lid, 0.05, 1500), then verifies position; consistent with the global plan that detects then moves above prior to yaw set and precise alignment.
